location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Governement, Military Department, Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that the detail from the marine battalion (outlined in the margin) ordered to Bushire to relieve the remaining factory guard has been embarked on board the HC Cruizer Aurora.
